de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics.lighting

Class LightingManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics.lighting.LightingManager

  • public class LightingManager
extends Object
    Manages box2d lights internally and stores them in memory.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez
